channel.title: Need help with npcdrops.cfg
channel.description: Please help with npcdrops.cfg I've added this:[code]//corporal beast npcdrop = 2697 9800 1 8 npcdrop = 2697 9801 1 7 npcdrop = 2697 9802 1 6 npcdrop = 2697 9803 1 8 npcdrop = 2697 9804 1 6 npcdrop = 2697 9805 1 4 npcdrop = 2697 9806 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 9807 1 6 npcdrop = 2697 9808 1 4 npcdrop = 2697 9809 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 9810 1 8 npcdrop = 2697 9811 1 6 npcdrop = 2697 9812 1 4 npcdrop = 2697 9813 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 9814 1 7 npcdrop = 2697 9820 1 3 npcdrop = 2697 9821 1 5[/code] This makes my Corporal Beast drop all PVP armours, when i compile i'm not getting any errors. but when i run my server it says:[img]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/3364/theerror.png[/img] [url=http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/3364/theerror.png]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/3364/theerror.png[/url]

item.title: Need help with npcdrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

Primadude:

You need to use tab indentation using the ‘tab’ button in between values in the Configuration file, rather than spaces with the space bar.

Can u fix them for me please? i tryed with ‘tab’ still same error.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with npcdrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You need to use tab indentation using the ‘tab’ button in between values in the Configuration file, rather than spaces with the space bar.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with npcdrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

Please help with npcdrops.cfg I’ve added this://corporal beast npcdrop = 2697 9800 1 8 npcdrop = 2697 9801 1 7 npcdrop = 2697 9802 1 6 npcdrop = 2697 9803 1 8 npcdrop = 2697 9804 1 6 npcdrop = 2697 9805 1 4 npcdrop = 2697 9806 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 9807 1 6 npcdrop = 2697 9808 1 4 npcdrop = 2697 9809 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 9810 1 8 npcdrop = 2697 9811 1 6 npcdrop = 2697 9812 1 4 npcdrop = 2697 9813 1 2 npcdrop = 2697 9814 1 7 npcdrop = 2697 9820 1 3 npcdrop = 2697 9821 1 5
This makes my Corporal Beast drop all PVP armours, when i compile i’m not getting any errors. but when i run my server it says: http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/3364/theerror.png

Read full topic
